Table of Contents

Class LargeTextureStore

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Textures
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A texture store that bypasses atlasing and removes textures from memory after dereferenced by all consumers.

public class LargeTextureStore : TextureStore, ITextureStore, IResourceStore<Texture>, IDisposable

Remarks

It's recommended to use manual mipmaps since large textures are generally rendered at full resolution and computing mipmaps automatically will be unnecessary overhead.

Constructors

LargeTextureStore(IRenderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload>, TextureFilteringMode, bool)
